clip.quote: I started doing Instagram videos, shorter form, TikTok, all the stuff that everyone else is kind of doing and I wasn't getting a lot of traction with it.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of finding unique angles in content creation.
clip.suggested_hook: Struggling with social media traction? Here's how to stand out.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Struggling to get noticed on social media? Here's how to break through the noise!",
    "SETUP": "Phil Wells, a real estate expert, shares his journey with social media. He tried Instagram and TikTok, but traction was elusive.",
    "INSIGHT": "Phil realized that blending in wasn't enough. He started creating content with unique angles, focusing on storytelling and authenticity to connect with his audience.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Standing out on social media is crucial. By showcasing your unique perspective, you can build a brand that resonates and attracts clients.",
    "CTA": "Ready to revamp your social media strategy? Start by identifying what makes your story unique and share it!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Break through the social media noise with unique content! #RealEstateMarketing",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMarketing", "#SocialMediaStrategy", "#ContentCreation", "#BrandBuilding", "#RealEstateSuccess"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```

clip.quote: You have to be willing to do poor work that's not up to your taste standards until your skill develops.
clip.why_clipworthy: Encourages perseverance and growth in content creation.
clip.suggested_hook: Why your first videos might suck—and why that's okay.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why your first videos might suck—and why that's okay.",
    "SETUP": "Phil Wells shares why embracing imperfection is key in real estate video marketing.",
    "INSIGHT": "\"You have to be willing to do poor work that's not up to your taste standards until your skill develops,\" says Phil. It's about growth.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Accepting early mistakes helps you refine your brand and content. It's a journey, not a sprint.",
    "CTA": "Start creating today. What will you learn from your first video? Share your thoughts below!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Embrace imperfection. Your first videos are just the beginning. #RealEstateGrowth",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMarketing", "#ContentCreation", "#MindsetShift", "#VideoMarketing", "#GrowthMindset"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```
